con:part.con:content: <wsdl:definitions targetNamespace="jolie.bank.soap.wsdl.wsdl" xmlns:xsd1="jolie.bank.soap.wsdl.xsd" xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" minOccurs="1" name="sessionId" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="confirmResponse"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="token" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="createPayment"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="amount" type="xs:double"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="orderId" type="xs:int"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="sessionId" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="createPaymentResponse"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="success" type="xs:boolean"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="paymentId" type="xs:int"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="login"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="password" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="username" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="loginResponse"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="success" type="xs:boolean"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="sessionId" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="refund"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="paymentId" type="xs:int"/> maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="success" type="xs:boolean"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> </xs:schema> </wsdl:types> <wsdl:message name="refundResponse"> <wsdl:part name="body"
